channel.title: [317] FunPK

item.title: [317] FunPK
item.dc:creator: @Dhfhy1 Dhfhy1
item.description:
@Dhfhy1 wrote:

Okay so I made a new FunPK For my server i have the safe zones and everything i made it so when you die you keep all your stuff and it teleports you to Home this worked but you freeze when you get sent to home and you have to log out to move and your character doesnt show the die animation just gets sent to home when there hp = 0 I used these codes.

[code=text] if ((absX >= xxxx1 && absX <= xxxx2 && absY >= yyyy2 && absY <= yyyy1 && IsDead == true && NewHP <= 1)) {
NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
setSkillLevel(3, getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]),
playerXP[playerHitpoints]);
playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
refreshSkills();
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
teleportToX = xxxx;
teleportToY = yyyy;
sendMessage(“After they die, you insert text here.”);
}

    else if (IsDead == true && NewHP <= 1) {
        refreshSkills();
        ApplyDead();
    }  [/code]

I put this code Under

 // If killed apply dead

Can someone please help me fix this?

Read full topic
